Headline: #95 95th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near Burley/91st
ShortDescription: Westbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Canal
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are rerouted via, Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route, due to a bridge lift near Roosevelt/Canal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via, Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route, due to a bridge lift near Roosevelt/Canal. 

Allow extra travel time.
